title: 31th July 1970: Black Tot Day sees the British Royal Navy issue the last daily rum ration to sailors
itunes:summary: In December 1969 the Admiralty Board, which meets in order to administer the Royal Navy, published a written statement that said issuing rum was ‘no longer compatible with the high standards of efficiency required’ and the daily ration was stopped the following ...
dc:creator: History Pod
